channel.title: The game itself wouldn't load before it crashed
channel.description:
> [color=red]*For better/faster support, try Discord: https://discord.gg/tol[/color]
What happened: The game crashed on the little option box, before I even got to the main game, or click on anything.
What was SUPPOSED to happen: It was supposed to run flawlessly without crashing
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. Start the game. 2. Click either option on Steam's box. 3. Crash the game on the next box for no reason.
